attributes.action: Stop taxing key workers during Coronavirus lockdown restrictions.
attributes.additional_details:
As key workers we are continuing to work with a higher risk to ourselves with reduced hours resulting in reduced pay. 

We have no risk payments or compensation. 

Front line staff, nhs, bus and rail workers, school teachers, supermarkets, hgv drivers, we continue to keep this country on its feet. 

We want the government to give all key workers who are still working a tax holiday. 

We continue to pay national insurance but we don’t get taxed on our pay during the lockdown. We are struggling.
attributes.background: We want the government to stop taxing key workers during the Coronavirus outbreak.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
